features: 1.【Enough quantity】8 Pcs toilet bumpers with 2 strong adhesive,the quantity is enough for you to use and replace, perfect solve the problem which the gap between toilet and seat.Ideal for home, hotel, hospital and so on.

2.【High quality】The toilet seat bumper is made up of ABS on white top and TPE on gray bottom,high quality material ensures durability and use lifetime, strong self-adhesive strip make the toilet seat more stable.
3.【Practical function】 The toilet seat bumper can increase toilet seat height,reduce noise and protect the toilet surface from friction and scratch. Great part attachment for the bidet.

4.【Convenient to use】 The toilet seat bumper is universal and suitable for most toilet seat.Just make the toilet seat rings keep clean and dry, peel off the self-adhesive back on the bumper and stick it on the toilet seat rings.Make sure the bumper stick firmly after installation.

5.【Two heights choose from】The toilet seat bumper has two kinds of thicknesses. The length is 4.5cm/1.77 inch, width is 2 cm/ 0.79 inch and the thickness is 1.9 cm/0.75 inch and 1.6cm/0.63inch respectively.
body.description: Self-adhesive Strip Toilet Seat Bumper Choose fitting heights (0.63 inch / 0.78 inch) Universal toilet seat bumper size: Length: 1.77inch / 4.5cm Width: 0.79inch / 2cm Height: 0.78inch / 2cm or 0.63inch / 1.6cm (installed different pads) Package Includes: 8 * Oblong pieces bumpers 8 * 1.6cm height TPE pads 8 * 1.9cm height TPE pads 2 * Adhesion Promoter

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: iFealClear 8 Pieces Toilet Seat Bumper with 8 Extra Pads for Changing Heights

Toilet Seat Bumper Features: The toilet bumper is made of ABS plastic, and TPE,top quality material ensure is sturdy and durable. Fill the gap between toilet and seat,make the toilet stable and firm. The package includes 8 toilet seat bumper, 8 different height replacement pads and 2 strong adhesive. 2 kinds of thicknesses bumper for you to choose. Toilet seat bumper is universal which fit most model of toilet seat. Toilet seat bumper is not only can reduce the sound when the toilet seat is dropped but also can protect the toilet seat surface.

Self-adhesive Strip Toilet Seat Bumper Choose fitting heights (0.63 inch / 0.78 inch) Universal toilet seat bumper size: Length: 1.77inch / 4.5cm Width: 0.79inch / 2cm Height: 0.78inch / 2cm or 0.63inch / 1.6cm (installed different pads) Package Includes: 8 * Oblong pieces bumpers 8 * 1.6cm height TPE pads 8 * 1.9cm height TPE pads 2 * Adhesion Promoter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with my purchase.
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with my purchase. Very easy to install… Works like a charm! I read other peoples reviews and they were concerned with the adhesive holding strong. I did not use additional adhesive and the bumpers are staying in place and show no signs of turning loose. I am very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Leveling Devices
reviews.reviewText: Fast shipping. Great price and quality of product. The items allow you to level a variety of toilet seats due to the high and low height adjusters. One toilet required the tall risers while the other one required the low risers to be supported and level. The attached adhesive is top quality, too. Very pleased with the product results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Raised the front of the seat by the right amount
reviews.reviewText: Didn't trust the adhesive, so I screwed them in. The bumper covers fit over the screws. Just hope the stay on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars More precautions should be included
reviews.reviewText: These need to be placed correctly or the toilet seat will snap in half when you sit. Also the seat should be raised to a higher level for the spacers to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the job.
reviews.reviewText: My toilet seat has a recessed bottom surface and these bumpers did the job that no others could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Soft and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Then they just slide apart or the little pegs break off in the toilet lid. No. I am not a fat or heavy person. However, if you take the cushion off and just use the flat part with the pegs in the holes, that gives you 1/16" buffer. The adhesive ones last about a week then you just fish them out of the toilet and go on down the road. Good hand washing, always. No one asked me for my opinion on these so I finally volunteered it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more seat slipping
reviews.reviewText: These are great I used the thinner grey rubber parts. No more shifting of the seat off the bowl when you twist to wipe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars On time delivery
reviews.reviewText: They stop toilet lid from slipping
stabilise bien les caoutchoucs sont efficace et les caoutchoucs de deux épaisseurs facilite l'installation et aide l'adaptation a différent modèle de couvercle de cuvette

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great to stop the toilet from sliding
reviews.reviewText: I have a special need son. He uses a grab bar to help get onto the toilet. We purchased a lotof seats over the years. This product helps my son, no more unsafe sliding and no more seat purchasing.
A little to tall, maybe I needed to order a smaller size, but couldn't find them. Still works well
Noticed they do help but only meet the rim on front of seat, but not the back
My woman ordered a bidet, and the seat sat askew. These spacers fixed my problem. My only request was perfection, and I got it! It looks beautiful
